hiveArticle.title: On your product development team, which function is the most important player for setting product vision
hiveArticle.body:
#### On your product development team, which function is the most important player for setting product vision
***
I was going through the Linkedin, and found out this poll shared by Congnizant 

> Cognizant is an American multinational corporation that provides IT services, including digital, technology, consulting, and operations services. It is headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey, United States. Cognizant is part of the NASDAQ-100 and trades under CTSH.)

In my opinion technology changes quite often but the core functionality does not change much which means strong design is the key for product engineering.

I am not saying that you do not need technologists because that is equally important, tomorrow if any technology is obsolete then these leaders  will come handy to take that strong design as the base and build an awesome technology layer.

What do you think?
***
 - Technologists 
***
 - Design Leaders 
***
 - Any, lead
***
 - Both tech & design lead 
***
*Answer the question at [dpoll.xyz](https://dpoll.xyz/detail/@codingdefined/on-your-product-development-team-which-function-is-the-most-important-player-for-setting-product-vision/).*
